title: 1985년 United States v. Thomas B. Marshall, Jr. 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Thomas B. Marshall, Jr.. 판결일: 1985-07-15. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Thomas B. MARSHALL, Jr., Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1985-07-15
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Brown, Contie, Merritt

## 변호인

James F. Schaeffer, Sr. (argued), Schaeffer and Schaeffer, Memphis, Tenn., for defendant-appellant., W. Hickman Ewing,-Jr., U.S. Atty., Timothy R. DiScenza (argued), Memphis, Tenn., for plaintiff-appellee.

## 인용

- 767 F.2d 293

## 판결문 요약

767 F.2d 293
    18 Fed. R. Evid. Serv. 995
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.Thomas B. MARSHALL, Jr., Defendant-Appellant.
    No. 84-5849.
    United States Court of Appeals,Sixth Circuit.
    Argued June 11, 1985.Decided July 15, 1985.
    
      James F. Schaeffer, Sr.  (argued), Schaeffer and Schaeffer, Memphis, Tenn., for defendant-appellant.
      W. Hickman Ewing, Jr., U.S. Atty., Timothy R. DiScenza (argued), Memphis, Tenn., for plaintiff-appellee.
      Before MERRITT and CONTIE, Circuit Judges, and BROWN, Senior Circuit Judge.
      MERRITT, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      Defendant, a former Memphis police officer, appeals his jury conviction for conspiracy to influence testimony of a witness before a federal grand jury, 18 U.S.C. Sec. 371, obstruction of justice, 18 U.S.C. Sec. 1503, and extortion under color of official right of a duly commissioned officer, 18 U.S.C. Sec. 1951.  Defendant argues on appeal that the District Court should have declared a mistrial because of an unauthorized telephone conversation between a juror and a relative of one of the government's witnesses.  He also argues that the District Court erred in refusing to grant a mistrial based on a remark made by the Court to the effect that defendant's answer to a question seemed "rehearsed."    On the issue of juror contact, defendant maintains that Budoff v. Holiday Inns, Inc., 732 F.2d 1523 (6th Cir.1984), requires that we reverse the District Court's denial of the mot...
